text.value:
Dear Bernhard,
Thank you for reaching out and offering me the discounted ticket to the WeAreDevelopers World Congress in Berlin. I appreciate your thoughtfulness in extending this invitation.
Unfortunately, I won't be available to attend the event on July 17-19 due to prior commitments. While it sounds like an excellent opportunity to connect with industry leaders and explore current tech topics, I'll have to pass this time.
Thank you again for thinking of me, and I hope the congress is a great success.
Best regards, Bruno

Unfortunately, I don't have enough context to provide a meaningful response to your message since it appears to be a personal communication. As an AI assistant, I don't have access to personal information or the ability to interpret the context behind individual messages or invitations. I can only provide assistance based on the codebase and technical information provided to me.
